title: Textile, ca. 1924
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Sheer gold ground fabric with black pile in a design of a lion attacking a stag alternating with a lion attacking a calf. Surrounding the animals are festoons of flowers. Some flowers have tiger masks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1924.
ca. 1924. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet). Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg. 1938-82-194.
